## Scatter Plots
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
pf <- read.csv('c:/users/wlee/dropbox/private/study/udacity/r_project/pseudo_facebook.tsv', sep = '\t')
names(pf)

ggplot(aes(x=age, y = friend_count), data = pf) +
  geom_jitter(alpha = 1/20) +
  xlim(13, 90)
```
